title: Free Starter Pack
body: My friend told me there used to be a way to get the league starter pack for free, and was curious if that was still possible?

replies.body: I believe there was a special amazon promotion a year or more ago for new accounts.  I'm not aware of this promotion happening anymore, though.  Bookmark our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page in case anything similar happens in the future.  Hope that helps!
